text: Lawrence Kasdan (born January 14, 1949) is an American screenwriter, movie producer and director. He directed Return of the Jedi and The Empire Strikes Back. He was born in Miami, Florida. ==References== Category:American movie directors Category:Movie producers from Florida Category:Writers from Miami Category:Businesspeople from Miami Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Screenwriters from Florida Category:Movie directors from Florida
title: Lawrence Kasdan
